Outstanding Issue: Water bars on both north and south banks are ineffective.
Proposed Mitigation: Repair water bars to ensure run-off is directed into forest.

Outstanding Issue: Failing silt fencing on north and south banks.
Proposed Mitigation: Reattach silt fencing to stakes as required and leave in place until vegetation is fully established. Secure silt fencing into soil where required.

Potential Adverse Effect: Unnecessary and may impact existing vegetation.

Outstanding Issue: Lack of shrub vegetation in riparian zone
Potential Adverse Effect: Reduces complexity of existing riparian habitat, potentially increasing bank instability.
Proposed Mitigation: Plant willow cuttings within riparian buffer.

Outstanding Issue: Failing silt fencing on east and west  banks.
Proposed Mitigation: Reattach silt fencing to stakes as required and leave in place until vegetation is fully established.
